meanings.definition: Having an excess of fat or oil added during the soap-making process.

meanings.definition: To add an excess of fat or oil to a substance.
meanings.sent1: She superfatted the dough to make the cookies extra rich.
meanings.sent2: It is important to superfat the lotion for better hydration.
meanings.sent3: He superfatted the salad dressing, making it too oily to eat.
meanings.sent4: The chef superfatted the sauce, creating a decadent flavor.
meanings.sent5: Superfatting the mixture made the dish incredibly indulgent.
